title: Insurance claims adjuster reports
dataVerified: Claimant name, adjuster name, adjuster license, damage assessment, claim amount, inspection date, photos
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Claim status (if claim resolved). Link to adjusting firm system (insurance carriers and SIU investigators, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents forged adjuster reports enabling inflated claims. Domain binding verifies adjusting firm legitimacy. Tamper-evident damage assessment documentation. Fraud investigation by Special Investigations Unit. Audit trail for claim handling. Critical for claim disputes where adjuster findings determine settlement amounts.
